snippet: A federal rule will require oceangoing freighters entering American waters to install onboard treatment systems to filter and disinfect their ballast water.
abstract: New federal rule will require oceangoing freighters entering American waters to install onboard treatment systems to filter and disinfect their ballast water, in an effort to keep ships from bringing in unwanted invasive species.
lead_paragraph: A federal rule will require oceangoing freighters entering American waters to install onboard treatment systems to filter and disinfect their ballast water.

headline.seo: Invasive Species Target of New Ballast Water Rule
headline.main: New Rules Seek to Prevent Invasive Stowaways
headline.print_headline: New Rules Seek to Prevent Invasive Stowaways
